channel.title: Connections site to server not working?
channel.description: Ok, so I was coding this site, and I added highscores and auto donation. I followed tutorials made by other people to set them up. So, I set them up, and they don't work. The Highscores doesn't show the players and the auto donations doesn't give the players their shit. I know it's a connection problem, but I don't know how to fix it... If this is any help, theres a vote4points system that's working!

item.title: Connections site to server not working?
